snippet: The New York Times Company is close to a deal to sell the online resource guide About.com to Answers.com for $270 million, reports Christine Haughney.
abstract: The New York Times Company is close to a deal to sell the online resource guide About.com to Answers.com for $270 million, reports Christine Haughney.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Nears Deal to Sell About.com
